Title: Silence of the Lambs

Genre.Description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience.

Title: Philadelphia

Title: The 40 Year Old Virgin

Title: Knocked Up
Description: For fun-loving party animal Ben Stone, the last thing he ever expected was for his one-night stand to show up on his doorstep eight weeks later to tell him she's pregnant with his child.

Title: Funny People

Title: Do the Right Thing

Director.Name: Spike Lee
Director.Bio: Shelton Jackson ‘Spike’ Lee (born March 20, 1957) is an American film director, producer, screenwriter, and actor. His production company, 40 Acres and a Mule Filmworks, has produced more than 35 films since 1983. He made his directorial debut with She's Gotta Have It (1986).

Title: Crooklyn
Description: Spike Lee's vibrant semi-autobiographical portrait of a school teacher, her stubborn jazz musician husband and their five kids living in Brooklyn in 1973.
